General.Name: Ktima Kostas Lazaridis S.A
General.Description: Ktima Kostas Lazaridis S.A. engages in the production and sale of wines in Greece. It offers various families of wines, including Amethystos, Château Julia, Domaine Costa Lazaridi, Oenotria Land, and Oenodea. The company also provides Idoniko Tsipouro, Idoniko Ouzo, and various Methexis grape distills; Botanico balsamic vinegars; and Magnum. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Drama, Greece.
